Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chuzhi xiang de zhurenmen ma
Nandao ta meiyou shi tamen de jimou, bian cheng wuyi de ma
Ta ceng paiqian cheng qun de niao qu shang tamen
shi tamen bian cheng chi sheng de gancao yiyang
